publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-996 Mr Jamie Stone: "Clawback" of Private Pensions—That the Parliament notes the apparent unfairness of "clawback" which applies to some private companies’ pension schemes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in order that this issue be investigated and resolved.

S1M-996 Mr Jamie Stone: "Clawback" of Private Pensions—That the Parliament notes the apparent unfairness of "clawback" which applies to some private companies’ pension schemes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in order that this issue be investigated and resolved.
S1M-996 "Clawback" of Private Pensions (lodged on 12 June 2000) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-996 "Clawback" of Private Pensions (lodged on 12 June 2000) Alex Neil*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-996 "Clawback" of Private Pensions (lodged on 12 June 2000) Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S1M-996 Mr Jamie Stone: "Clawback" of Private Pensions—That the Parliament notes the apparent unfairness of "clawback" which applies to some private companies’ pension schemes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in order that this issue be investigated and resolved. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Alex Neil, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-996 "Clawback" of Private Pensions (lodged on 12 June 2000) Christine Grahame*

S1M-996 Mr Jamie Stone: "Clawback" of Private Pensions—That the Parliament notes the apparent unfairness of "clawback" which applies to some private companies’ pension schemes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in order that this issue be investigated and resolved. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Alex Neil, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ian Jenkins, Christine Grahame
